Camden.Camden Safe Deposit & Trust Company:
Camden Safe Deposit & Trust Company is located at Camden in Camden County, New Jersey, United States. The building was built in 1929 and was added to the National Register of Historic Places on August 22, 1990.
Patterned after the Riccardi Palace in Florence, Italy, the four-story building rises directly from the side walk on the northeast corner of Market Street and Broadway.
